resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>446b129d-3aca-4e17-b11e-7f4d7d6eeef7#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Virginiai oposszum</string>
            <string language="en">Virginian opossum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virginian Opossum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Opossum de Virginian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gambá de Virginian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Opossum di Virginian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη Βιργινία opossum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oposum de Virginian</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az amerikai kontinens legnagyobb erszényes emlőse. Fákon él, sötétedés után jár eleségért, mindenevő.</string>
            <string language="en">Biggest marsupial mammal of the American continent. Lives on trees,  looks for food after dark, omnivorous.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  oposszum,  erszényesek,  Észak-Amerika,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, opossum, marsupials, North-America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größtes Beutelsäugetier des amerikanischen 
Kontinentes. Die Leben auf Bäumen, sucht nach Nahrung nach der 
Dunkelheit, omnivorous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le plus grand mammifère marsupial du continent 
américain. Les vies sur des arbres, recherche la nourriture 
après l'obscurité, omnivore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mamífero marsupial o mais grande do continente 
americano. As vidas em árvores, procuram o alimento após a 
obscuridade, omnivorous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mammifero marsupiale più grande del continente 
americano. Le vite sugli alberi, cerca l'alimento dopo 
oscurità, omnivorous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγαλύτερο marsupial θηλαστικό της αμερικανικής 
ηπείρου. Οι ζωές στα δέντρα, ψάχνουν τα τρόφιμα μετά από 
σκοτεινό, παμφάγος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mamífero marsupial más grande del continente
americano. Las vidas en árboles, buscan el alimento después de
la obscuridad, omnivorous.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, Opossum, Beuteltiere, Norden-Amerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, opossum, marsupiaux, nord-america</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, gambá, marsupiais, Norte-América</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, opossum, marsupiali, Nord-America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, opossum, marsupials, Βόρεια Αμερική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, oposum, marsupiales, Norte-Ame'rica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74801</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=446b129d-3aca-4e17-b11e-7f4d7d6eeef7&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
